name: SkyCast
0:
”Alexa, open sky cast”
”Alexa, ask sky cast to lengthen weather”
”Alexa, ask sky cast to shorten weather”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sky cast
des:
This is a weather skill with a couple of additional user-friendly features that cater to the user's lifestyle. The user can choose to shorten or lengthen the responses the app gives. The app strives to give the user the most useful information possible by taking into account things like the amount of sunlight remaining.

The only requirements is that the user give the device's address. Device address must be set in the Alexa companion app, or else the skill will not work. Permissions for the device address is also granted in the Alexa companion app. The skill works on all Alexa devices. The skill has no steps to get started.

This skill currently only works in the United States. This skill uses no trademarks, intellectual property, or brands
